msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; The papyrus is broken: at the top, in the end of the column's lines and in the bottom. Few spots of salt can be seen. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (MA)
